code:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    %% Compact, readable bus-reset state machine: R0 left, R1 center, T0 right

    powerReset: powerReset
    resetDetected: resetDetected
    ibrCond: ibr && !(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    maxArbStateTimeout: maxArbStateTimeout(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

    R0: R0 — Reset Start\nresetStartActions(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    R1: R1 — Reset Wait\nresetWaitActions(HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
    T0: T0 — Tree ID Start

    %% Triggers to R0 (HealthTech_PatientRecords)
    powerReset --> R0: arbPowerReset(HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
    resetDetected --> R0: initiatedReset = FALSE
    ibrCond --> R0: initiatedReset = TRUE / resetDuration = RESET_TIME
    maxArbStateTimeout --> R0: initiatedReset = TRUE / resetDuration = RESET_TIME; PH_EVENT_INDICATION

    %% Core transitions
    R0 --> R1: arbTimer >= resetDuration / resetStartActions(HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)
    R1 --> T0: resetComplete(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) / arbTimer = 0

    %% Back-transition and timeout
    R1 --> R0: arbTimer >= resetDuration + RESET_WAIT / resetDuration = RESET_TIME

    note left of R0
      External triggers to R0:\n• powerReset (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer))\n• resetDetected (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)\n• ibr && !(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault) (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)\n• maxArbStateTimeout(HealthTech_PatientRecords) (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)\n• from TX: Transmit → -TX:R0
    end note

    note right of R1
      Timeout/Recovery:\n• R1→R0 sets resetDuration = RESET_TIME\n• R1→T0 on resetComplete(HealthTech_PatientRecords) sets arbTimer = 0
    end note
